Don't confuse complex with complicated.  Complexity is the natural orders of the universe. @NicoleBaker721 #NYSHRM15
Creating the illusion of certainty is dangerous.  You miss threats and disrupters coming from outside the org. @NicoleBaker721 #NYSHRM15
VUCA = Volatile, Uncertain, Complex, Ambiguous.  Describes many workplaces these days. @NicoleBaker721 #NYSHRM15
